links.title: Science Reveals The Face Of God And It Looks Like Elon Musk
links.description: Once you see them side by side, the resemblance is so obvious. Put an aggregated vision of what God looks like next to a head shot of Elon Musk and prepare to be freaked out. A study that surveyed 511 American Christians yielded a composite image of what the participants believe God looks like.

links.title: Insider Trade ALERT
links.description: This page contains data for Insider trading from Form 4 filings that were released by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) within the last business day. "Insiders" are corporate officers (CEO, CFO, COO, etc.), members of the board of directors, and large shareholders (those who own more than 10% of a company).
